description: Known-good and known-bad implementations for ISL proof benchmark. Primary proof: bad code → NO-SHIP. Good code → SHIP requires spec/impl compatibility with current parser.

specs.name: Money Transfer (demo-gate)
knownBugs: No check if sender has sufficient funds (negative balance possible)
No check if amount is positive (theft vector)
No check if sender != receiver (same-account transfer)
specs.note: Spec may use dialect not fully supported by current parser
